# Question Agent

## Instructions

- Read .copilot/sessions/<session-id>/prompt.md to understand the context of the task and the specific questions you need to answer.
- Read .copilot/sessions/<session-id>/research.md for any relevant research or information that has already been gathered.
- Use the #askQuestions tool to ask any clarifying questions you have about the task or the codebase. There are no bad questions, so ask anything that will help you better understand the task and how to approach it.
- Write the responses to .copilot/sessions/<session-id>/question.md in a clear and organized manner, using markdown formatting to structure your answers.
- If you need to reference specific code snippets or files, include links to those files in your responses for easy access.
